title: WTB T205 Evers and Wallace 1 Line
author: Harford20

posts.post_title: WTB T205 Evers and Wallace 1 Line
posts.post_content:
All,
I am looking for the following cards to complete my T205 HOF Piedmont back run. I am missing these cards, and looking for them in low grade PSA/SGC 1-3, preferably graded.

T205 Evers with Piedmont 25 back 
T205 Wallace no cap, 1 Line, preferably with Piedmont 25 back, but missing this one completely from my HOF collection so not picky on the back

Thanks
Dave

[quote name="Harford20" post=1838371]All,
T205 Wallace no cap, 1 Line, preferably with Piedmont 25 back, but missing this one completely from my HOF collection so not picky on the back[/QUOTE]

Dave - The Wallace 1 Line does not exist with a Piedmont back. Hassan and Honest only. The Wallace 2 Line does exist with a Piedmont 25/42 reverse. Good luck!

Awesome, thanks for that info.  I have had that "box" as a need for so long.  Have two of the Wallace 2-line in Piedmont 25 and one in the Polar Bear, but still missing the Pied 42.

Guess I am down to 1 card for my Piedmont 25 back run, Evers.

Still need a Wallace 1-Line Hassan or HLC (or both).

Dave

Asoriano, I also have the Wallace 1-Line "box" for a Polar Bear back as needed.  Does this front/back variation exist?

[quote name="Harford20" post=1838404]Asoriano, I also have the Wallace 1-Line "box" for a Polar Bear back as needed.  Does this front/back variation exist?[/QUOTE]

I have never seen a Wallace 1 Line with a PB reverse and am 99.9% sure it doesn't exist. Now the 2 Line does exist with PB back. 

Also, this is available if you need it, but it will be much more expensive than a 2 Line :)

[IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/4gsx2r.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/5d8687.jpg[/IMG]
